content.text:
# Wartenberg (Swabian Jura)

| type = Diatreme
| first_ascent =
| easiest_route =
}}
Wartenberg () is a mountain of volcanic origin in the Hegau region  (Tuttlingen district) of southern Baden-Württemberg, Germany. The ruins of Wartenberg Castle rest on top of the mountain.
References
*Johannes Baier & Armin Scherzinger (2021): Das Vulkanfeld im Hegau. Aufschluss, 72(2): 58–69.
*Johannes Baier & Armin Scherzinger (2024): Geohistorische Bemerkungen zum Vulkanfeld im Hegau. Jh. Ges. Naturkde. Württemberg, 180, 277–301.
